snippet.title: Arma 3 Contact - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
What if humanity suddenly encounters extraterrestrial intelligence on Earth? The Arma 3 Contact spin-off expansion is OUT NOW! https://arma3.com/contact

Watch the Launch Trailer for #Arma3Contact – a spin-off expansion about the most important discovery in the history of mankind. Its alien visitors and military science fiction singleplayer campaign arrive together with a new 163 square kilometer terrain, plus new factions, weapons, vehicles, and gear for the wider #Arma3 sandbox.

Arma 3 Contact - Announcement Trailer: https://youtu.be/ds7RoCrhUyk
Arma 3 Contact - Sandbox Trailer: https://youtu.be/wpCQZdhnDAM

Buy Arma 3 Contact now with a 10% discount until August 1st:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1021790
Bohemia Store - https://store.bistudio.com/products/arma3-contact

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410
